channel.title: Mr. Tea
channel.description: Posts in the discussion thread "Mr. Tea"

item.title: Re: Mr. Tea
item.content:encoded: Thank you. Guess my Sannin run is pre-Awesome Pants.

item.title: Re: Mr. Tea
item.content:encoded: I'm certain that after Mr. Tea 'dies' you only get him back from The Pantsless ( and you also keep Strawberry2 that way as well ), but that's the only way to get him back this season.

item.title: Mr. Tea
item.content:encoded:
Alright, just a fairly straightforward question.

After you take the special mission The Secret, Mr. Tea leaves you, no?

Well, the wiki isn't exactly clear on when he rejoins you. Is it at the special mission The Dark Band? The text (of the mission) seems to suggest that you get him back (though not incredibly strongly), but it's not explicitly stated anywhere that I can find in the wiki.

OR do you not get him back (as Lvl. 3) until The Pantsless? If that's the case, what happens if you take The Pants instead. Do you just not get Mr. Tea back at all?

I ask because I'll eventually need him for a Sannin run, but I'm not exactly in any hurry. If I get him back at The Dark Band, then I'll just wait until then, but if I have to wait until The Pants/Pantsless, then I'll probably do my run beforehand.

Thanks to anyone who can answer my question.
